name: Solar Sim (Mr.Nr.15)
description:
A realistic 2D simulation of gravity and orbits.

I made this out of boredom over the holidays but I'd love to get some feedback.
Please also consider rating the game if you like it.

Controls:
-Left click to accelerate
-Right click on a planet to enter relative view
(useful for orbiting)
-Press F to return to absolute view
-Press R to reset
-Mouse wheel to zoom
(your engine is stronger when zoomed out)

Planets were generated using Deep-Folds Pixel Planet Generator:
https://deep-fold.itch.io/pixel-planet-generator
